quote: How to get more opportunity: Create more opportunity for others. – Jack Butcher
fact: A “jiffy” is the scientific name for 1/100th of a second.
tip: Use keyboard shortcuts to save time.
joke: I made a belt out of watches once... It was a waist of time.
